mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
